tags: it's just me saying stuff to myself
no one's gonna read this anyway
summary: I've been a tumblr user for a long time but mine was basically an academic blog... Very sciency... I occasionally looked up...
body: I’ve been a tumblr user for a long time but mine was basically an academic blog… Very sciency… I occasionally looked up Harry Potter memes but apart from that it was all science and physics and stars and planets mostly. I continued blogging even when I went to college and got a job. I’ve seen fandoms and fandom wars go on and looked up things about Avengers and Sherlock (BBC). I read many people declare that everyone on tumblr ends up watching Supernatural and I promised myself that I won’t. No. Not happening. Those “we-have-a-gif-for-everything” fandom is not gonna have my heart, I thought. Months and years passed. In 2018 May, I was diagnosed with a lung infection and I was basically bedridden, unable to even speak properly for about a month. Then I came across this on Pinterest and I was curious. And that is the story of how I watched 12 seasons of Supernatural in 2 weeks before I went back to work. I guess that’s the equivalent of saying that a fandom kidnapped you. And yeah, that fandom too has a piece of my heart now.

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

summary: Sunshine and Tomatoes, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
title: Sunshine and Tomatoes, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
description:
Title: Sunshine and Tomatoes
Author: Colubrina
Fandom: Harry Potter
Ship: Nottgood (Luna/Theodore Nott)

Summary: Theodore Nott had every intention of ignoring the Marriage Law - the very idea the government could force him to get married was absurd - until Luna Lovegood smiled at him in the dingy office, tomatoes in her hair. ONE-SHOT.

summary:
Harry: We have a new classmate in Auror training
Ron: Who?
Harry: Malfoy
Ron: No. Please, tell me this isn't happening. I...
body:
Harry: We have a new classmate in Auror training
Ron: Who?
Harry: Malfoy
Ron: No. Please, tell me this isn't happening. I thought I haven't got to see you pining after him anymore. Why!? Why the world hates me so much!?
Harry: What? I don't like Malfoy!
Ron:... Why me!? Why!?

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: We have a new classmate in Auror training

dialogue.name: Ron
dialogue.label: Ron:
dialogue.phrase: No. Please, tell me this isn't happening. I thought I haven't got to see you pining after him anymore. Why!? Why the world hates me so much!?

summary: Petition to bring old pottermore back Am I the only one that thinks the old pottermore was farrrrr superior to the new and,...
body:
Petition to bring old pottermore back

Am I the only one that thinks the old pottermore was farrrrr superior to the new and, heck, even some games created? (*cof cof* hogwarts mystery *cof cof*)

I miss the old house cup event, the thrill to get house points by either duelling (which, sometimes, was actually challenging) or potion brewing (which was even harder, I can’t count how many times I exploded a cauldron! Snape must have hated me) I used to spend hours discussing this with my best friend! I was the good one at duelling and she was the best potion master of all time!! Those were the times…

Excluding the fact that we had interactive story bits from the book in which we could search for hidden objects. It was like treasure hunting! And it was so fun cause we could see our favourite scenes, that weren’t so great in the movie or didn’t even get there, come to life!

And we also had all the extra stories J.K. Rowling provided and stills provides. All the extra character informations and history, new secrets of the castle or the magical world, new spells and creatures. Even a Quidditch Newspaper, written by Ginny herself!

All in all, old pottermore was the best!! And I would love for it to come back! (with all the new stuff the current pottermore has obviously, cause god knows how long I waited for that patronus quiz)

summary: She is terrible at potions. So terrible in face around 75% of the time the potion blows up in her face. She has taken to wearing...
body:
Headcannon about MC

She is terrible at potions. So terrible in face around 75% of the time the potion blows up in her face. She has taken to wearing protective glasses and a knights helmet to class to avoid death via explosion.

blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: All the Young Dudes
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RsNlcp

by Photohawk

Un fic muy largo que sigue la trayectoria de los Merodeadores por Hogwarts (y más allá) desde el punto de vista de Remus. Difiere del canon en que el padre de Remus murió y por lo tanto fue criado en un hogar para niños, con otro par de imperfecciones.

Una traducción del fic del mismo título de MsKingBean89 con su permiso.

Words: 1971, Chapters: 1/188, Language: Español

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black, Lily Evans Potter, James Potter, Peter Pettigrew, Severus Snape, Minerva McGonagall, Bellatrix Black Lestrange, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Albus Dumbledore, Mulciber Sr. (Harry Potter), Horace Slughorn, Mary Macdonald, Marlene McKinnon, Poppy Pomfrey, Walburga Black, Regulus Black, Fenrir Greyback
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Sirius Black & Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter
  • Additional Tags: Marauders’ Era, Marauders, Marauders Friendship (Harry Potter), wolfstar, Slow Burn, Canon Compliant, Angst, Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Requited Love, Canonical Character Death


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RsNlcp

trail.content:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RsNlcp

by Photohawk

Un fic muy largo que sigue la trayectoria de los Merodeadores por Hogwarts (y más allá) desde el punto de vista de Remus. Difiere del canon en que el padre de Remus murió y por lo tanto fue criado en un hogar para niños, con otro par de imperfecciones.

Una traducción del fic del mismo título de MsKingBean89 con su permiso.

summary: Thank you for answering my last ask about harry potter as a character. You really put into words what i think in a way that i...
question: Thank you for answering my last ask about harry potter as a character. You really put into words what i think in a way that i couldn't. You are a truly great writer and literary analyst. Do you think this is one of the reasons the books and movies were so popular?
answer: Of course! Thank you so much for those kind words! Do I think that Harry’s characterization is a reason these books/movies were popular? Maybe. I think that the story always remembers these characters are kids and writes them as such and therefore every reader/viewer can insert themselves into the world of Hogwarts on a much easier scale.

And even though you've never read the books, some parts of your analysis on Harry really line up with how I felt about him in the books and that's pretty cool! I guess that shows the movies are doing something right (tho book harry is definitely not soft spoken haha).
answer: I guess they did something right after all!

summary: Did u get to the end of the movie? Even though you knew the twist, what were your reactions on the scene anyways?
question: Did u get to the end of the movie? Even though you knew the twist, what were your reactions on the scene anyways?
answer:
Well I didn’t know Snape was going to kill Dumbledore, so that surprised me. However, there obviously has to be a reason for Snape and Dumbledores conversation towards the end of the film, and I have to assume this was Dumbledores plan (to some degree) all along. Like I wouldn’t be surprised if he comes back somehow, even more powerful than ever. 

The scene was good, I thought Draco’s performance was A+. I hope he’s in the last two movies even more, because although he’s a little bitch, I think the actor is superb. 

I was moved by Dumbledores death but it annoyed me Ginny hugged Harry instead of Hermione and Ron. I also don’t get why Ron was sitting alone in the last scene and not part of the conversation between Harry and Hermione. 

Also…Dumbledores phoenix? TEARS

(just to be clear, any theorizing i’m doing here, PLEASE DON’T TELL ME IF I’M RIGHT OR NOT, I DO NOT WANT TO KNOW)
